text: Tiempo Perfecto is the first album released by Mexican rock band, Coda. It was released in 1990. ==Track listing== # "Intro" - 0:30 # "Girara (Hasta Caer)" - 3:36 # "Suelto El Deseo" - 3:43 # "Sin Dinero" - 3:20 # "Tiempo Perfecto" - 3:44 # "Espía" - 4:23 # "Por Que te Fuiste" - 5:14 # "Con O Sin Tí" - 5:18 # "Como Un Tiro" - 1:20 ==Personnel== * Salvador Aguilar - lead vocals * Toño Ruiz - guitars * Chucho Esquivel - drums * Zitto Bremont - bass * Diego Benyure - keyboards ==Notes== ==References== *Album Info at Heavy Harmonies. Category:Coda (band) EPs Category:1990 EPs
title: Tiempo Perfecto
